cards.name: Goblin Balloon Brigade
cards.text: {R}: Goblin Balloon Brigade gains flying until end of turn.

rulings.text: You can activate the ability repeatedly during a turn. This generally has no additional effect, unless some other effect (like that from Adarkar Windform has caused it to lose flying since the last time the ability resolved.

For flying to work as an evasion ability, an attacking Goblin Balloon Brigade’s ability must be activated before the declare blockers step begins. Once Goblin Balloon Brigade has become blocked, giving it flying won’t change that.

cards.name: Goblin King
cards.text: Other Goblins get +1/+1 and have mountainwalk.

rulings.text: Goblin King now has the Goblin creature type and its ability has been reworded to affect *other* Goblins. This means that if two Goblin Kings are on the battlefield, each gives the other a bonus.

cards.name: Goblin Rock Sled
cards.text:
Trample
Goblin Rock Sled doesn't untap during your untap step if it attacked during your last turn.
Goblin Rock Sled can't attack unless defending player controls a Mountain.

foreignNames.name: ハールーン・ミノタウルス

cards.name: Hurr Jackal
cards.text: {T}: Target creature can't be regenerated this turn.

cards.name: Immolation
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/-2.

cards.name: Inferno
cards.text: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

cards.name: Ironclaw Orcs
cards.text: Ironclaw Orcs can't block creatures with power 2 or greater.

cards.name: Keldon Warlord
cards.text: Keldon Warlord's power and toughness are each equal to the number of non-Wall creatures you control.

rulings.text: This is a Characteristic-Defining Ability. It checks the number of non-Wall creatures you control continuously, and applies in all zones. It is never “locked in”.

cards.name: Lightning Bolt
cards.text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

cards.name: Magnetic Mountain
cards.text:
Blue creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may choose any number of tapped blue creatures they control and pay {4} for each creature chosen this way. If the player does, untap those creatures.

cards.name: Mana Clash
cards.text: You and target opponent each flip a coin. Mana Clash deals 1 damage to each player whose coin comes up tails. Repeat this process until both players' coins come up heads on the same flip.

rulings.text: Always affects the player and targets one of their opponents.
Each point of damage is dealt separately, so if you are damaged twice by this spell, each time is considered a separate time this source deals damage.
This card’s coin flip has no winner or loser.

cards.name: Mana Flare
cards.text: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana of any type that land produced.

rulings.text: When used with lands that can produce multiple colors, Mana Flare produces one additional mana of the same color that was produced. It can’t give a mana of a color that wasn’t produced.
Only produces extra mana when land is tapped for mana, not when tapped by some other effect.
If the land produces more than one color of mana at a single time, its controller chooses which of those types is produced by Mana Flare’s ability.
This is a triggered mana ability.
Mana Flare adds one of whatever color the land produces after applying any land type or color changing effects.
The types of mana are white, blue, black, red, green, and colorless.
Does not copy any restrictions on the mana, such as with Mishra’s Workshop or Pillar of the Paruns.
Produces only one additional mana, regardless of how much was produced by tapping the land.

cards.name: Manabarbs
cards.text: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, Manabarbs deals 1 damage to that player.

rulings.text: This card has a triggered ability that causes a separate effect for 1 point of damage each time a land is tapped for mana.
This ability is not a mana ability. It goes on the stack and can be responded to.
The ability will trigger each time a land is tapped for mana. Each ability is separate.

If any lands are tapped for mana while a player is casting a spell or activating an ability, Manabarbs’s ability will trigger that many times and wait. When the player finishes casting that spell or activating that ability, it’s put on the stack, then Manabarbs’s triggered abilities are put on the stack on top of it. The Manabarbs abilities will resolve first.

On the other hand, a player can tap lands for mana, let the Manabarbs triggered abilities be put on the stack, and then respond to those abilities by casting an instant or activating an ability using that mana. In that case, the spell or ability will resolve first.

foreignNames.name: モンスのゴブリン略奪隊

cards.name: Orcish Artillery
cards.text: {T}: Orcish Artillery deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to you.

rulings.text: You do not take the 3 points of damage if the ability doesn’t resolve because the target is illegal.

cards.name: Orcish Oriflamme
cards.text: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.

cards.name: Power Surge
cards.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Power Surge deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of untapped lands they controlled at the beginning of this turn.

rulings.text: This card knows how many were untapped even if it was not on the battlefield at the beginning of the turn.

cards.name: Pyrotechnics
cards.text: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

rulings.text: The number of targets chosen for Pyrotechnics must be at least one and at most four. You choose how the damage is divided as you cast the spell, not as it resolves. Each target must be assigned at least 1 damage.
If some but not all of Pyrotechnics’s targets become illegal, you can’t change the division of damage. Damage that would have been dealt to illegal targets simply isn’t dealt.
If an effect creates a copy of Pyrotechnics, the number of targets and division of damage can’t be changed. The effect that creates the copy may allow you to change the targets, however.

cards.name: Red Elemental Blast
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Counter target blue spell.
• Destroy target blue permanent.

cards.name: Shatter
cards.text: Destroy target artifact.

rulings.text: Regenerating artifacts can regenerate from this.

cards.name: Shivan Dragon
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Sisters of the Flame
cards.text: {T}: Add {R}.

cards.name: Smoke
cards.text: Players can't untap more than one creature during their untap steps.

rulings.text: Animated lands are affected by this spell. If on the battlefield with an effect that limits the number of land you untap, untapping an animated land will count as the one creature and the one land you can untap... thereby limiting you to one thing to be untapped.

cards.name: Stone Giant
cards.text: {T}: Target creature you control with toughness less than Stone Giant's power gains flying until end of turn. Destroy that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

rulings.text: If the Giant’s power and/or toughness change so that its toughness is less than its power, you can have the ability target the Giant itself.
To work as an evasion ability, an attacking creature must already have flying when the declare blockers step begins. Once a creature has become blocked, giving it flying won’t change that.

If Stone Giant’s ability is activated during a turn’s end step, the delayed triggered ability won’t trigger until the beginning of the next turn’s end step. The targeted creature will be destroyed at that time.

When the delayed triggered ability resolves, the targeted creature is destroyed, even if it’s no longer a creature, no longer under your control, or no longer has toughness less than Stone Giant’s power at that time.

cards.name: Stone Rain
cards.text: Destroy target land.

cards.name: Tempest Efreet
cards.text:
Remove Tempest Efreet from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante.
{T}, Sacrifice Tempest Efreet: Target opponent may pay 10 life. If that player doesn't, they reveal a card at random from their hand. Exchange ownership of the revealed card and Tempest Efreet. Put the revealed card into your hand and Tempest Efreet from anywhere into that player's graveyard. This change in ownership is permanent.

cards.name: The Brute
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0.
{R}{R}{R}: Regenerate enchanted creature.

cards.name: Tunnel
cards.text: Destroy target Wall. It can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Uthden Troll
cards.text: {R}: Regenerate Uthden Troll.

cards.name: Wall of Dust
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever Wall of Dust blocks a creature, that creature can't attack during its controller's next turn.

cards.name: Wall of Fire
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{R}: Wall of Fire gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Wall of Stone
cards.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)

cards.name: Winds of Change
cards.text: Each player shuffles the cards from their hand into their library, then draws that many cards.

rulings.text: Each player draws a number of cards equal to the number of cards they shuffled into their own library.

cards.name: Ali Baba
cards.text: {R}: Tap target Wall.
cards.flavor:
"When he reached the entrance of the cavern, he pronounced the words, 'Open, Sesame!'"
—*The Arabian Nights*, Junior Classics trans.

rulings.text: This ability may be used to tap more than one Wall per turn if you have enough mana, since tapping isn’t part of the activation cost.
The ability may tap walls even when Ali Baba is tapped or just entered the battlefield, since the activation cost doesn’t include {T}.

foreignNames.name: Ali Baba
foreignNames.text: {R}: Tappe eine Mauer.

cards.originalText: ooR Tap target wall.

cards.name: Ball Lightning
cards.text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ball Lightning.

rulings.text: The creature is sacrificed at the end of every turn in which it is on the battlefield. There is no choice about what turn to sacrifice it.

foreignNames.name: Kugelblitz
foreignNames.text:
Verursacht Trampelschaden
Für den Kugelblitz gilt die Einsatzverzögerung nicht.
Begrabe den Kugelblitz am Ende eines Zuges.

foreignNames.name: ボール・ライトニング

cards.originalText:
Trample
Ball Lightning can attack the turn it comes into play. At the end of any turn, bury Ball Lightning.

cards.name: Bird Maiden
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor:
Four things that never meet do here unite To shed my blood and to ravage my heart, A radiant brow and tresses that beguile And rosy cheeks and a glittering smile."
—The Arabian Nights, trans. Haddawy

foreignNames.name: Vogelmädchen
foreignNames.text: Fliegend

cards.originalText: Flying

cards.name: Blood Lust
cards.text: If target creature has toughness 5 or greater, it gets +4/-4 until end of turn. Otherwise, it gets +4/-X until end of turn, where X is its toughness minus 1.

rulings.text: Has changed slightly in functionality, with the old continuous nature of the toughness reduction gone away; the toughness change remains static. For example, if you have three Swamps and Nightmare on the battlefield and then cast Blood Lust on it, it will become 7/1. If one of your Swamps is subsequently destroyed, your Nightmare will become 6/0 and be put in the graveyard.

foreignNames.name: Blutrausch
foreignNames.text: Die Zielkreatur erhält +4/-4 bis zum Ende des Zuges. Wenn dadurch die Widerstandskraft der Kreatur unter 1 sinkt, so bleibt sie auf 1.

cards.originalText: Target creature gets +4/-4 until end of turn. If this reduces creature's toughness to less than 1, creature's toughness becomes 1.

cards.name: Brothers of Fire
cards.text: {1}{R}{R}: Brothers of Fire deals 1 damage to any target and 1 damage to you.
cards.flavor: Fire is never a gentle master.

foreignNames.name: Bruderschaft des Feuers
foreignNames.text: {1}{R}{R}: Die Bruderschaft des Feuers fügt einer Kreatur oder einem anderen Spieler 1 Schadenspunkt zu —aber auch Dir.

cards.originalText: 1oRooR Brothers of Fire deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to you.

cards.name: Burrowing
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has mountainwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

foreignNames.name: Wege des Maulwurfs
foreignNames.text: Die verzauberte Kreatur erhält Gebirgstarnung.

cards.originalText: Target creature gains mountainwalk.

cards.name: Cave People
cards.text:
Whenever Cave People attacks, it gets +1/-2 until end of turn.
{1}{R}{R}, {T}: Target creature gains mountainwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
cards.originalText:
When attacking, Cave People gets +1/-2 until end of turn.
1oRoR, ocT: Target creature gains mountainwalk until end of turn.

cards.name: Chaoslace
cards.text: Target spell or permanent becomes red. (Its mana symbols remain unchanged.)

foreignNames.name: Chaosgewebe
foreignNames.text: Die Farbe einer entweder sich im Spiel befindlichen oder gerade gespielten Karte verändert sich in Rot. Völlig unberührt davon bleiben der Gebrauch einer bestimmten Fähigkeit und die Kosten des Zauberns, des Tappens oder der Versorgung des Ziels.

cards.originalText: Change the color of target spell or target permanent to red. Costs to cast, tap, maintain, or use a special ability of target remain unchanged.

cards.name: Crimson Manticore
cards.text:
Flying
{R}, {T}: Crimson Manticore deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
cards.flavor: Noted neither for their good looks nor their charm, Manticores can be fearsome allies. As dinner companions, however, they are best left alone.

foreignNames.name: Karmesin-Mantikor
foreignNames.text:
Kann fliegen.
{R}, {T}: Der Mantikor fügt einer angreifenden oder blockenden Kreatur einen Schadenspunkt zu.

cards.originalText:
Flying
oR, ocT: Manticore deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

cards.name: Detonate
cards.text: Destroy target artifact with converted mana cost X. It can't be regenerated. Detonate deals X damage to that artifact's controller.

rulings.text: If the artifact becomes an illegal target before resolution, then no damage is done.

foreignNames.name: Detonation
foreignNames.text: Begrabe ein Artefakt Deiner Wahl mit Spruchkosten von X. Die Detonation fügt dem Beherrscher dieses Artefakts X Schadenspunkte zu.

cards.originalText: Bury target artifact. Detonate deals X damage to the artifact's controller, where X is the casting cost of the artifact.

cards.name: Disintegrate
cards.text: Disintegrate deals X damage to any target. If it's a creature, it can't be regenerated this turn, and if it would die this turn, exile it instead.

rulings.text: The “can’t regenerate” is an effect of Disintegrate and not an effect of the damage. It works even if the damage is prevented or redirected. If redirected, the damage does not take this effect with it.
Disintegrated creatures do not go to the graveyard at all before being exiled. They do not trigger abilities which trigger due to a creature going to the graveyard.

foreignNames.name: Zersetzung
foreignNames.text: Die Zersetzung verursacht bei einem Spieler oder einer Kreatur Deiner Wahl X Schadenspunkte. Diese Kreatur kann in diesem Zug nicht regenerieren. Sollte sie in diesem Spielzug tödlichen Schaden erleiden, entferne sie ganz aus dem Spiel

cards.originalText: Disintegrate deals X damage to target creature or player. The target cannot regenerate until end of turn. If the target receives lethal damage this turn, remove it from the game entirely.

cards.name: Dragon Whelp
cards.text:
Flying
{R}: Dragon Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice Dragon Whelp at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor:
"O to be a dragon . . . of silkworm size or immense . . ."
—Marianne Moore, *"O to Be a Dragon"*

rulings.text: The first three times Dragon Whelp’s ability is activated in a turn will do nothing other than give it +1/+0 until end of turn. Any subsequent activations will also cause its delayed triggered ability to trigger. That means if you activate Dragon Whelp’s ability five times, for example, two different delayed triggered abilities will trigger at the beginning of the next end step and cause you to sacrifice Dragon Whelp.

If the fourth (or more) time Dragon Whelp’s ability is activated during the same turn happens to be during that turn’s end step, the delayed triggered ability won’t trigger until the beginning of the next turn’s end step. You’ll have to sacrifice Dragon Whelp at that time.

foreignNames.name: Drachenjunges
foreignNames.text:
Kann fliegen.
{R}: +1/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
Gibst Du in diesem Zug dabei mehr als RRR aus, vernichte das Drachenjunge am Ende des Zuges.

cards.originalText:
Flying
ooR +1/+0 until end of turn. If you spend more than oRoRoR in this way during one turn, destroy Dragon Whelp at end of turn.

cards.name: Dwarven Warriors
cards.text: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

rulings.text: The ability can be activated after a creature is blocked, but it has no effect. Once a creature is blocked, it can’t be unblocked.
If you increase the power of the targeted creature after the ability resolves, it still can’t be blocked that turn.

foreignNames.name: Zwergenkrieger
foreignNames.text: {T}: Mache eine Kreatur mit einer Stärke von maximal 2 bis zum Ende Deines Zuges unblockbar. Andere Karten können später die Stärke dieser Kreatur über 2 hinaus erhöhen.

cards.originalText: ocT: Target creature with power no greater than 2 becomes unblockable until end of turn. Other effects may later be used to increase the creature's power beyond 2.

cards.name: Earth Elemental
cards.flavor: Earth Elementals have the eternal strength of stone and the endurance of mountains. Primordially connected to the land they inhabit, they take a long-term view of things, scorning the impetuous haste of short-lived mortal creatures.

cards.name: Earthquake
cards.text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

rulings.text: Whether or not a creature is without flying is only checked on resolution.

foreignNames.name: Erdbeben
foreignNames.text: Das Erdbeben fügt jeden Spieler und jeder Kreatur ohne Flugfähigkeit X Schadenspunkte zu.

cards.originalText: Earthquake deals X damage to each player and each creature without flying.

cards.name: Eternal Warrior
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has vigilance.
cards.flavor: Warriors of the Tsunami-nito School spend years in training to master the way of effortless effort.

foreignNames.name: Ewiger Krieger
foreignNames.text: Die verzauberte Kreatur wird beim Angreifen nicht getappt.

cards.originalText: Attacking does not cause target creature to tap.

cards.name: Fire Elemental
cards.flavor: Fire Elementals are ruthless infernos, annihilating and consuming their foes in a frenzied holocaust. Crackling and blazing, they sear swift, terrible paths, leaving the land charred and scorched in their wake.

cards.name: Fireball
cards.text:
This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

rulings.text: For example, if X is 5 and you choose three target creatures, Fireball has a total cost of {7}{R} (even though its mana cost is just {5}{R} and its converted mana cost is 6). If those creatures are all still legal targets as Fireball resolves, it deals 1 damage to each of them.
You may cast Fireball with zero targets, regardless of the value chosen for X. If you do so, it will not be a targeted spell, and no damage will actually be dealt when it resolves.
Fireball’s damage is divided as Fireball resolves, not as it’s cast, because there are no choices involved. The division involves only targets that are still legal as Fireball resolves.
You can target more than X creatures. However, if the number of legal targets at the time Fireball resolves is greater than X, none of them will be dealt any damage.

foreignNames.name: Feuerball
foreignNames.text: Der Feuerball verursacht insgesamt X Schaden. Dieser wird gleichmäßig (aufgerundet) über Zielkreaturen und/oder Spieler verteilt. Bezahle zusätzlich 1 für jedes Ziel mit Ausnahme des ersten.

cards.originalText: Fireball deals X damage, divided evenly (round down) among any number of target creatures and/or players. Pay an additional o1 for each target beyond the first.

cards.name: Firebreathing
cards.text:
Enchant creature
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"And topples round the dreary west A looming bastion fringed with fire."
—Alfred, Lord Tennyson, "In Memoriam"

rulings.text: This ability can be activated by Firebreathing’s controller, not the enchanted creature’s controller (in case they’re different players).
The ability affects whichever creature is enchanted by Firebreathing at the time the ability resolves. The bonus remains even if Firebreathing stops enchanting that creature.

foreignNames.name: Feuerodem
foreignNames.text: {R}: Die verzauberte Kreatur erhält +1/+0 bis zum Ende Deines Zuges.

cards.originalText: ooR Target creature Firebreathing enchants gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Fissure
cards.text: Destroy target creature or land. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor:
"Must not all things at the last be swallowed up in death?"
—Plato

cards.originalText: Bury target land or creature.

cards.name: Flashfires
cards.text: Destroy all Plains.

cards.originalText: Destroy all plains.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
cards.flavor:
"O! it is excellent To have a giant's strength, but it is tyrannous To use it like a giant."

cards.flavor: "From up here we can drop rocks and arrows and more rocks!" "Uh, yeah boss, but how do we get down?"

rulings.text: You can activate the ability repeatedly during a turn. This generally has no additional effect, unless some other effect (like that from Adarkar Windform has caused it to lose flying since the last time the ability resolved.

For flying to work as an evasion ability, an attacking Goblin Balloon Brigade’s ability must be activated before the declare blockers step begins. Once Goblin Balloon Brigade has become blocked, giving it flying won’t change that.

cards.name: Goblin King
cards.text: Other Goblins get +1/+1 and have mountainwalk.
cards.flavor: To become king of the Goblins, one must assassinate the previous king. Thus, only the most foolish seek positions of leadership.

rulings.text: Goblin King now has the Goblin creature type and its ability has been reworded to affect *other* Goblins. This means that if two Goblin Kings are on the battlefield, each gives the other a bonus.

foreignNames.name: Goblinkönig
foreignNames.text: Alle Goblins erhalten +1/+1 und die Fähigkeit Gebirgstarnung.

Goblin Rock Sled doesn't untap during your untap step if it attacked during your last turn.

cards.originalText:
Trample
Cannot attack if defending player controls no mountains. Rock Sled does not untap during your untap phase if it attacked during your last turn.

cards.name: Gray Ogre
cards.flavor: The Ogre philosopher Gnerdel believed the purpose of life was to live as high on the food chain as possible. She refused to eat vegetarians, preferring to live entirely on creatures that preyed on sentient beings.

cards.name: Hill Giant
cards.flavor: Fortunately, Hill Giants have large blind spots in which a human can easily hide. Unfortunately, these blind spots are beneath the bottoms of their feet.

cards.name: Hurloon Minotaur
cards.flavor: The Minotaurs of the Hurloon Mountains are known for their love of battle. They are also known for their hymns to the dead, sung for friend and foe alike. These hymns can last for days, filling the mountain valleys with their low, haunting sounds.

cards.flavor:
"Any scrap of compassion that still existed in my soul was permanently snuffed out when they cast me out into the flames."
—Mairsil, called the Pretender

foreignNames.name: Inferno
foreignNames.text: Das Inferno fügt allen Spielern und allen Kreaturen 6 Schadenspunkte zu.

cards.originalText: Inferno deals 6 damage to all players and all creatures.

cards.name: Ironclaw Orcs
cards.text: Ironclaw Orcs can't block creatures with power 2 or greater.
cards.flavor: Generations of genetic weeding have given rise to the deviously cowardly Ironclaw clan. To say that Orcs in general are vicious, depraved, and ignoble does not do justice to the Ironclaw.

foreignNames.name: Orks von der eisernen Klaue
foreignNames.text: Können keine Kreaturen blocken, die eine Stärke größer als 1 haben.

foreignNames.name: Orques de la griffe de fer

cards.originalText: Cannot be assigned to block any creature with power greater than 1.

cards.name: Keldon Warlord
cards.text: Keldon Warlord's power and toughness are each equal to the number of non-Wall creatures you control.

rulings.text: This is a Characteristic-Defining Ability. It checks the number of non-Wall creatures you control continuously, and applies in all zones. It is never “locked in”.

foreignNames.name: Keldonischer Kriegsfürst
foreignNames.text: Stärke und Widerstandskraft des Kriegsfürsten entsprechen der Anzahl an Nicht-Mauerkreaturen, die Du kontrollierst.

cards.originalText: Keldon Warlord has power and toughness each equal to the number of non-wall creatures you control, including Warlord. For example, if you control two other non-wall creatures, Warlord is 3/3. If one of those creatures leaves play, Warlord immediately becomes 2/2.

cards.name: Lightning Bolt
cards.text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

foreignNames.name: Blitzschlag
foreignNames.text: Der Blitz fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler 3 Schadenspunkte zu.

cards.originalText: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Magnetic Mountain
cards.text:
Blue creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may choose any number of tapped blue creatures they control and pay {4} for each creature chosen this way. If the player does, untap those creatures.

foreignNames.name: Magnetberg
foreignNames.text: Blaue Kreaturen können nicht normal enttappt werden. Während ihrer Versorgungsphase müssen die Spieler für jede blaue Kreatur, die sie enttappen wollen, 4 zahlen —und zwar zusätzlich zu allen anderen Aktivierungskosten, die für diese blaue Kreatur bereits verlangt werden.

cards.originalText: Blue creatures do not untap during their controllers' untap phase. During his or her upkeep, a player may pay an additional o4 to untap a blue creature he or she controls.

cards.name: Mana Clash
cards.text: You and target opponent each flip a coin. Mana Clash deals 1 damage to each player whose coin comes up tails. Repeat this process until both players' coins come up heads on the same flip.

rulings.text: Always affects the player and targets one of their opponents.
Each point of damage is dealt separately, so if you are damaged twice by this spell, each time is considered a separate time this source deals damage.
This card’s coin flip has no winner or loser.

foreignNames.name: Manakollision
foreignNames.text: Du und Dein Gegner werfen eine Münze. Wer „Zahl" wirft, verliert einen Lebenspunkt. Werft so oft, bis beide Spieler gleichzeitig „Kopf" werfen.

cards.originalText: You and target opponent each flip a coin. Mana Clash deals 1 damage to any player whose coin comes up tails. Repeat this process until both players' coins come up heads at the same time.

cards.name: Mana Flare
cards.text: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana of any type that land produced.

rulings.text: When used with lands that can produce multiple colors, Mana Flare produces one additional mana of the same color that was produced. It can’t give a mana of a color that wasn’t produced.
Only produces extra mana when land is tapped for mana, not when tapped by some other effect.
If the land produces more than one color of mana at a single time, its controller chooses which of those types is produced by Mana Flare’s ability.
This is a triggered mana ability.
Mana Flare adds one of whatever color the land produces after applying any land type or color changing effects.
The types of mana are white, blue, black, red, green, and colorless.
Does not copy any restrictions on the mana, such as with Mishra’s Workshop or Pillar of the Paruns.
Produces only one additional mana, regardless of how much was produced by tapping the land.

foreignNames.name: Manasegen
foreignNames.text: Wenn immer einer der Spieler ein Lan wegen Mana tappt, erhält er 1 weiteres Mana des gleichen Typs.

cards.originalText: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, it produces one additional mana of the same type.

cards.name: Manabarbs
cards.text: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, Manabarbs deals 1 damage to that player.

rulings.text: This card has a triggered ability that causes a separate effect for 1 point of damage each time a land is tapped for mana.
This ability is not a mana ability. It goes on the stack and can be responded to.
The ability will trigger each time a land is tapped for mana. Each ability is separate.

If any lands are tapped for mana while a player is casting a spell or activating an ability, Manabarbs’s ability will trigger that many times and wait. When the player finishes casting that spell or activating that ability, it’s put on the stack, then Manabarbs’s triggered abilities are put on the stack on top of it. The Manabarbs abilities will resolve first.

On the other hand, a player can tap lands for mana, let the Manabarbs triggered abilities be put on the stack, and then respond to those abilities by casting an instant or activating an ability using that mana. In that case, the spell or ability will resolve first.

foreignNames.name: Manahaken
foreignNames.text: Jedesmal, wenn ein Land getappt wird, um dem Manavorrat aufzustocken, fügt Manahaken dem Beherrscher des Landes 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

cards.originalText: Each time any land is tapped for mana, Manabarbs deals 1 damage to that land's controller.

cards.name: Mons's Goblin Raiders
cards.flavor: The intricate dynamics of Rundvelt Goblin affairs are often confused with anarchy. The chaos, however, is the chaos of a thundercloud, and direction will sporadically and violently appear. Pashalik Mons and his Raiders are the thunderhead that leads in the storm.

foreignNames.name: モンスのゴブリン略奪隊

cards.name: Orcish Artillery
cards.text: {T}: Orcish Artillery deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to you.
cards.flavor: In a rare display of ingenuity, the Orcs invented an incredibly destructive weapon. Most Orcish artillerists are those who dared criticize its effectiveness.

rulings.text: You do not take the 3 points of damage if the ability doesn’t resolve because the target is illegal.

foreignNames.name: Ork-Artillerie
foreignNames.text: {T}: Die orkische Artillerie fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler 2 Schadenspunkte zu, Dir selbst jedoch 3 Punkte Schaden.

cards.originalText: ocT: Orcish Artillery deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 3 damage to you.

cards.name: Orcish Oriflamme
cards.text: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.

foreignNames.name: Standarte der Orks
foreignNames.text: Alle angreifenden Kreaturen unter Deiner Kontrolle erhalten +1/+0

cards.originalText: All attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.

cards.name: Power Surge
cards.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Power Surge deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of untapped lands they controlled at the beginning of this turn.

rulings.text: This card knows how many were untapped even if it was not on the battlefield at the beginning of the turn.

foreignNames.name: Stromstoß
foreignNames.text: Der Stromstoß fügt jedem Spieler während seiner Versorgungsphase für jedes Land, das zu Beginn seines Zuges und vor der Enttap-Phase nicht getappt war, einen Schadenspunkt zu.

cards.originalText: During each player's upkeep, Power Surge deals that player 1 damage for each land he or she controls that was untapped at the beginning of the turn, before the untap phase.

cards.name: Pyrotechnics
cards.text: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.
cards.flavor:
"Hi! ni! ya! Behold the man of flint, that's me! Four lightnings zigzag from me, strike and return."
—Navajo war chant

rulings.text: The number of targets chosen for Pyrotechnics must be at least one and at most four. You choose how the damage is divided as you cast the spell, not as it resolves. Each target must be assigned at least 1 damage.
If some but not all of Pyrotechnics’s targets become illegal, you can’t change the division of damage. Damage that would have been dealt to illegal targets simply isn’t dealt.
If an effect creates a copy of Pyrotechnics, the number of targets and division of damage can’t be changed. The effect that creates the copy may allow you to change the targets, however.

foreignNames.name: Pyrotechnik
foreignNames.text: Die Pyrotechnik verursacht 4 Schadenspunkte, die Du beliebig auf Kreaturen und/oder Spieler Deiner Wahl verteilen kannst.

cards.originalText: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided any way you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.

cards.name: Red Elemental Blast
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Counter target blue spell.
• Destroy target blue permanent.

foreignNames.name: Roter Urknall
foreignNames.text: Neutralisiert einen blauen Zauberspruch oder zerstört eine blaue Karte im Spiel.

cards.originalText: Counter target blue spell or destroy target blue permanent.

cards.name: Shatter
cards.text: Destroy target artifact.

rulings.text: Regenerating artifacts can regenerate from this.

foreignNames.name: Zersplittern
foreignNames.text: Zerstöre ein Artefakt.

cards.originalText: Destroy target artifact.

cards.name: Shivan Dragon
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: While it's true most Dragons are cruel, the Shivan Dragon seems to take particular glee in the misery of others, often tormenting its victims much like a cat plays with a mouse before delivering the final blow.

foreignNames.name: Shivan-Drache
foreignNames.text:
Kann fliegen.
{R}: +1/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

cards.originalText:
Flying
ooR +1/+0 until end of turn

cards.name: Sisters of the Flame
cards.text: {T}: Add {R}.
cards.flavor: We are many wicks sharing a common tallow; we feed the skies with the ashes of our prey.

foreignNames.name: Schwestern der Flamme
foreignNames.text: {T}: Erhöhe Deinen Manavorrat um R. Spiele diese Eigenschaft wie einen Unterbrechungszauber.

cards.originalText: ocT: Add oR to your mana pool. Play this ability as an interrupt.

cards.name: Smoke
cards.text: Players can't untap more than one creature during their untap steps.

rulings.text: Animated lands are affected by this spell. If on the battlefield with an effect that limits the number of land you untap, untapping an animated land will count as the one creature and the one land you can untap... thereby limiting you to one thing to be untapped.

foreignNames.name: Rauch
foreignNames.text: Jeder Spieler kann während seiner Entap-Phase nur eine eigene Kreatur enttappen.

cards.originalText: No player may untap more than one creature during his or her untap phase.

cards.name: Stone Giant
cards.text: {T}: Target creature you control with toughness less than Stone Giant's power gains flying until end of turn. Destroy that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

rulings.text: If the Giant’s power and/or toughness change so that its toughness is less than its power, you can have the ability target the Giant itself.
To work as an evasion ability, an attacking creature must already have flying when the declare blockers step begins. Once a creature has become blocked, giving it flying won’t change that.

If Stone Giant’s ability is activated during a turn’s end step, the delayed triggered ability won’t trigger until the beginning of the next turn’s end step. The targeted creature will be destroyed at that time.

When the delayed triggered ability resolves, the targeted creature is destroyed, even if it’s no longer a creature, no longer under your control, or no longer has toughness less than Stone Giant’s power at that time.

foreignNames.name: Steinriese
foreignNames.text: {T}: Eine Zielkreatur, deren Widerstandskraft kleiner als die Stärke des Steinriesen sein muß, erhält bis zum Ende der Runde Flugfähigkeit. Vernichte diese Kreatur am Ende des Zuges. Andere Effekte können später die Widerstandskraft dieser Kreatur über die Stärke des Riesen hinaus erhöhen.

cards.originalText: ocT: Target creature you control, which must have toughness less than Stone Giant's power, gains flying until end of turn. Destroy that creature at end of turn. Other effects may later be used to increase the creature's toughness beyond Stone Giant's power.

cards.name: Stone Rain
cards.text: Destroy target land.

foreignNames.name: Steinhagel
foreignNames.text: Zerstöre ein Gelände.

cards.originalText: Destroy target land.

cards.name: Tempest Efreet
cards.text:
Remove Tempest Efreet from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante.
{T}, Sacrifice Tempest Efreet: Target opponent may pay 10 life. If that player doesn't, they reveal a card at random from their hand. Exchange ownership of the revealed card and Tempest Efreet. Put the revealed card into your hand and Tempest Efreet from anywhere into that player's graveyard. This change in ownership is permanent.

foreignNames.name: Sturm-Ifrit
foreignNames.text: {T}: Ziehe eine Karte aus dem Blatt des Gegners und nimm sie auf Deine Hand. Lege den Sturm-Ifrit danach auf dem Friedhof des Gegners ab. Dieser Besitzerwechsel ist permanent. Spiele diese Eigenschaft wie einen Unterbrechungszauber. Bevor Du eine Karte aus des Gegners Blatt ziehst, kann dieser diesen Effekt verhindern, indem er entweder 10 Lebenspunkte zahlt oder aufgibt. Geschieht dies, lege den Sturm-Ifrit auf Deinem Friedhof ab. Nimm diese Karte vor dem Spiel aus Deinem Stapel, wenn ohne Einsatz gespielt wird.

cards.originalText: ocT: Choose a card at random from target opponent's hand and put it in yours. Bury Tempest Efreet in opponent's graveyard. The change in ownership is permanent. Play this ability as an interrupt. Before you choose the card to be switched, the opponent may prevent effect by paying 10 life or conceding game; if this is done, bury Tempest Efreet. Effects that prevent or redirect damage cannot be used to counter this loss of life. Remove Tempest Efreet from your deck before playing if not playing for ante.

cards.name: The Brute
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0.
{R}{R}{R}: Regenerate enchanted creature.
cards.flavor:
"Union may be strength, but it is mere blind brute strength unless wisely directed."
—Samuel Butler

foreignNames.text:
Die verzauberte Kreatur erhält +1/+0.
{R}{R}{R}: Regeneriert die verzauberte Kreatur.

cards.originalText:
Target creature gets +1/+0.
oRoRooR Regenerate target creature The Brute enchants.

cards.name: Tunnel

cards.originalText: Bury target wall.

cards.flavor:

—Troll chant
cards.originalText: ooR Regenerate

cards.name: Wall of Dust
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever Wall of Dust blocks a creature, that creature can't attack during its controller's next turn.
cards.flavor: An ever-moving swarm of dust engulfs and disorients anything that comes near.
cards.originalText: No creature blocked by Wall of Dust may attack during its controller's next turn.

cards.name: Wall of Fire
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{R}: Wall of Fire gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Conjured from the bowels of hell, the fiery wall forms an impassable barrier, searing the soul of any creature attempting to pass through its terrible bursts of flame.

foreignNames.name: Feuerwand
foreignNames.text: {R}: +1/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

cards.originalText: ooR +1/+0 until end of turn

cards.name: Wall of Stone
cards.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
cards.flavor: The Earth herself lends her strength to these walls of living stone, which possess the stability of ancient mountains. These mighty bulwarks thwart ground-based troops, providing welcome relief for weary warriors who defend the land.

cards.name: Winds of Change
cards.text: Each player shuffles the cards from their hand into their library, then draws that many cards.
cards.flavor:
"'Tis the set of sails, and not the gales, Which tells us the way to go."
—Ella Wheeler Wilcox

rulings.text: Each player draws a number of cards equal to the number of cards they shuffled into their own library.

foreignNames.name: Winde des Wechsels
foreignNames.text: Alle Spieler mischen ihr Blatt in ihre Bibliothek und ziehen für sich genauso viele neue Karten, wie sie vorher auf der Hand hatten.

cards.originalText: All players shuffle their hands into their libraries and then draw the same number of cards they originally held.

cards.name: Beacon of Destruction
cards.text: Beacon of Destruction deals 5 damage to any target. Shuffle Beacon of Destruction into its owner's library.
cards.flavor: The Great Furnace's blessing is a spectacular sight, but the best view comes at a high cost.

rulings.text: If a Beacon is countered or doesn’t resolve, it’s put into its owner’s graveyard, not shuffled into the library.

foreignNames.name: Leitstern der Zerstörung
foreignNames.text: Der Leitstern der Zerstörung fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 5 Schadenspunkte zu. Mische den Leitstern der Zerstörung in die Bibliothek seines Besitzers.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Segnung der Großen Schmelze ist spektakulär anzusehen, aber den besten Blick muss man meist teuer bezahlen.

foreignNames.name: Faro de destrucción
foreignNames.text: El Faro de destrucción hace 5 puntos de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo. Baraja el Faro de destrucción en la biblioteca de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: La bendición del Gran horno es un gran espectáculo, pero las mejores ubicaciones tienen un alto precio.

foreignNames.name: Flambeau de la Destruction
foreignNames.text: Le Flambeau de la Destruction inflige 5 blessures à une cible, créature ou joueur. Mélangez le Flambeau de la Destruction à la bibliothèque de son propriétaire.
foreignNames.flavor: La bénédiction du Grand Fourneau est un spectacle qui malheureusement coûte cher à ceux qui veulent y assister.

foreignNames.name: Faro della Distruzione
foreignNames.text: Il Faro della Distruzione infligge 5 danni a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio. Rimescola il Faro della Distruzione nel grimorio del suo proprietario.
foreignNames.flavor: La benedizione della Grande Fornace è una visione spettacolare, ma i posti migliori per guardarla hanno un prezzo molto salato.

foreignNames.name: 破壊の標
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。破壊の標はそれに５点のダメージを与える。破壊の標をオーナーのライブラリーに加えて切り直す。
foreignNames.flavor: 大焼炉の祝福は素晴らしい見ものだが、一番見栄えの良い場所は高くつく。

foreignNames.name: Guia da Destruição
foreignNames.text: Guia da Destruição causa 5 pontos de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo. Embaralhe Guia da Destruição no grimório de seu dono.
foreignNames.flavor: A bênção da Grande Fornalha é algo espetacular de se ver, mas a melhor vista tem um preço alto.

foreignNames.name: 毁灭信标
foreignNames.text: 毁灭信标对目标生物或牌手造成5点伤害。将毁灭信标洗入其拥有者的牌库。
foreignNames.flavor: 熔炉天恩之景象壮丽至极，但最好的景点可能让你付出极高代价。

cards.originalText: Beacon of Destruction deals 5 damage to target creature or player. Shuffle Beacon of Destruction into its owner's library.

cards.name: Bringer of the Red Dawn
cards.text:
You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn.

foreignNames.name: Bringer des Roten Morgens
foreignNames.text:
Du kannst {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} bezahlen, anstatt die Manakosten des Bringers des Roten Morgens zu bezahlen.
Verursacht Trampelschaden.
Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments kannst du eine Kreatur deiner Wahl enttappen und bis zum Ende des Zuges die Kontrolle über sie übernehmen. Diese Kreatur erhält Eile bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignNames.name: Adalid del amanecer rojo
foreignNames.text:
Puedes pagar {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} en lugar de pagar el coste de maná del Adalid del amanecer rojo.
Arrolla.
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, puedes enderezar la criatura objetivo y ganar el control de ella hasta el final del turno. Esa criatura gana la habilidad de prisa hasta el final del turno.

foreignNames.name: Annonciateur de l'Aube rouge
foreignNames.text:
Vous pouvez payer {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} à la place du coût de mana de l'Annonciateur de l'Aube rouge.
Piétinement
Au début de votre entretien, vous pouvez dégager la créature ciblée et en acquérir le contrôle jusqu'à la fin du tour. Cette créature acquiert la célérité jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignNames.name: Portatore dell'Alba Rossa
foreignNames.text:
Puoi spendere {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} invece di pagare il costo di mana del Portatore dell'Alba Rossa.
Travolgere
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, puoi STAPpare una creatura bersaglio e prenderne il controllo fino alla fine del turno. Quella creatura guadagna rapidità fino alla fine del turno.

foreignNames.name: 赤の夜明けの運び手
foreignNames.text:
あなたは赤の夜明けの運び手のマナ・コストを支払うのではなく、{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}を支払ってもよい。
トランプル
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、クリーチャー１体を対象とする。あなたはそれをアンタップし、ターン終了時までそれのコントロールを得てもよい。それはターン終了時まで速攻を得る。

foreignNames.name: Portador da Aurora Vermelha
foreignNames.text:
Você pode pagar {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} em vez de pagar o custo de mana do Portador da Aurora Vermelha.
Atropelar
No início de sua manutenção, você pode desvirar a criatura alvo e ganhar o controle dela até o final do turno. A criatura ganha ímpeto até o final do turno.

foreignNames.name: 红曙光信使
foreignNames.text:
你可支付{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}，而不支付红曙光信使的法术力费用。
践踏
在你的维持开始时，你可以重置目标生物并获得其操控权直到回合结束。该生物获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

cards.originalText:
You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay Bringer of the Red Dawn's mana cost.
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn.

cards.name: Cosmic Larva
cards.text:
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Cosmic Larva unless you sacrifice two lands.
cards.flavor: For millennia they wandered from plane to plane, devouring all metal. Finally, their wanderings are over.

foreignNames.name: Kosmische Larve
foreignNames.text:
Verursacht Trampelschaden.
Opfere die Kosmische Larve zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments, falls du nicht zwei Länder opferst.
foreignNames.flavor: Jahrtausendelang wanderten die Larven von einer Welt zur anderen und verschlangen alles Metall. Endlich müssen sie nicht mehr weiterziehen.

foreignNames.name: Larvas cósmicas
foreignNames.text:
Arrolla.
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, sacrifica las Larvas cósmicas a menos que sacrifiques dos tierras.
foreignNames.flavor: Durante milenios vagabundearon de plano en plano, devorando todo el metal. Finalmente, su viaje ha terminado.

foreignNames.name: Larve cosmique
foreignNames.text:
Piétinement
Au début de votre entretien, sacrifiez la Larve cosmique à moins que vous ne sacrifiiez deux terrains.
foreignNames.flavor: Pendant des millénaires, elles ont erré de plan en plan, dévorant tout métal sur leur passage. Enfin, leur voyage est terminé.

foreignNames.name: Larva Cosmica
foreignNames.text:
Travolgere
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, sacrifica la Larva Cosmica a meno che tu sacrifichi due terre.
foreignNames.flavor: Per millenni hanno vagato da una dimensione all'altra, divorandone tutto il metallo. E adesso il loro vagare è giunto al termine.

foreignNames.name: 星界の幼生
foreignNames.text:
トランプル
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたが土地を２枚生け贄に捧げないかぎり、星界の幼生を生け贄に捧げる。
foreignNames.flavor: 千年の間、彼らは次元から次元へと渡り歩き、金属をすべて食い尽くしてきた。そして、その放浪は終わりを告げた。

foreignNames.name: Larva Cósmica
foreignNames.text:
Atropelar
No início de sua manutenção, sacrifique Larva Cósmica a menos que você sacrifique dois terrenos.
foreignNames.flavor: Por milênios eles viajaram de plano em plano, devorando todo o metal. Finalmente, suas viagens terminaram.

foreignNames.name: 宇宙幼兽
foreignNames.text:
践踏
在你的维持开始时，除非你牺牲两个地，否则牺牲宇宙幼兽。
foreignNames.flavor: 他们在片界间漂泊千年，将所到之地的金属吞噬殆尽。而流浪的日子终于结束了。

cards.originalText:
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Cosmic Larva unless you sacrifice two lands.

cards.name: Feedback Bolt
cards.text: Feedback Bolt deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the number of artifacts you control.
cards.flavor: The path of least resistance is often through your enemies.

foreignNames.name: Rückkopplungsschlag
foreignNames.text: Der Rückkopplungsschlag fügt einem Spieler deiner Wahl Schadenspunkte in Höhe der Anzahl der Artefakte, die du kontrollierst, zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Der Weg des geringsten Widerstands führt oft mitten durch deine Feinde hindurch.

foreignNames.name: Rayo de retroalimentación
foreignNames.text: El Rayo de retroalimentación hace daño al jugador objetivo igual al número de artefactos que controles.
foreignNames.flavor: El camino de menor resistencia es a menudo a través de tus enemigos.

foreignNames.name: Éclair à rétroaction
foreignNames.text: L'Éclair à rétroaction inflige au joueur ciblé un nombre de blessures égal au nombre d'artefacts que vous contrôlez.
foreignNames.flavor: On rencontre souvent moins de résistance en traversant l'ennemi.

foreignNames.name: Scarica Retroattiva
foreignNames.text: La Scarica Retroattiva infligge a un giocatore bersaglio un ammontare di danni pari al numero di artefatti che controlli.
foreignNames.flavor: Il sentiero di minima resistenza passa spesso attraverso i tuoi nemici.

foreignNames.name: 反響の稲妻
foreignNames.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とする。反響の稲妻はそのプレイヤーに、あなたがコントロールするアーティファクトの総数に等しい点数のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 最も抜けやすい道は、しばしば敵の中を突っ切る。

foreignNames.name: Raio Retroalimentado
foreignNames.text: Raio Retroalimentado causa ao jogador alvo uma quantidade de dano igual ao número de artefatos que você controla.
foreignNames.flavor: O caminho de menor resistência costuma ser através de seus inimigos.

foreignNames.name: 反馈击
foreignNames.text: 反馈击对目标牌手造成伤害，其数量等同于由你操控的神器数量。
foreignNames.flavor: 通常来说，电阻最弱的路径就是穿过敌人身体。

cards.originalText: Feedback Bolt deals damage to target player equal to the number of artifacts you control.

cards.name: Furnace Whelp
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{R}: Furnace Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Baby dragons can't figure out humans—if they didn't want to be killed, why were they made of meat and treasure?

foreignNames.name: Welpe der Schmelze
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
{R}: Der Welpe der Schmelze erhält +1/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor: Babydrachen werden aus Menschen nicht schlau wenn sie nicht getötet werden wollen, warum bestehen sie dann aus Fleisch und bergen Schätze?

foreignNames.name: Cría del horno
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
{R}: La Cría del horno obtiene +1/+0 hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Las crías de dragón no entienden a los humanos. Si no quieren que los maten, ¿por qué los hicieron de carne y tesoro?

foreignNames.name: Dragonnet du fourneau
foreignNames.text:
Vol
{R} : Le Dragonnet du fourneau gagne +1/+0 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor: Les jeunes dragons ne comprennent pas les humains — S'ils ne veulent pas être tués, pourquoi ne sont-ils faits que de viande et de trésors ?

foreignNames.name: Cucciolo della Fornace
foreignNames.text:
Volare
{R}: Il Cucciolo della Fornace prende +1/+0 fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: I cuccioli di drago non riescono a comprendere gli umani: se non vogliono essere uccisi, perché sono fatti di cibo e tesori?

foreignNames.name: 焼炉の仔
foreignNames.text:
飛行
{R}：焼炉の仔はターン終了時まで+1/+0の修整を受ける。
foreignNames.flavor: ドラゴンの子供には、人間とは何なのか理解できない――殺されるのがいやなら、なんで彼らは肉と宝物でできてるんだろう？

foreignNames.name: Filhote da Fornalha
foreignNames.text:
Voar
{R}: Filhote da Fornalha recebe +1/+0 até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Os filhotes de dragão não conseguem compreender os humanos se eles não queriam ser comidos, por que foram feitos de carne e preciosidades?

foreignNames.name: 熔炉幼龙

飞行

foreignNames.flavor: 幼龙无法了解人类这种生物～既然不想被杀，那他们又为什么是用肉跟宝藏做的？

cards.name: Goblin Brawler

First strike
Goblin Brawler can't be equipped.
cards.flavor: Perhaps he shuns technology. Perhaps he appreciates nature. Perhaps he doesn't know the difference.

rulings.text: You can activate an equip ability that targets Goblin Brawler, but the Equipment will fail to move onto it.
